songs.title: Genie in a Bottle (Flavio vs. Mad Boris Mix)
songs.album: Dance Vault Mixes: Genie In a Bottle
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Mmm, my body's sayin' "Let's go"
Come on, come on
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(My body's sayin' "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")
(My body's sayin' "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")

[Post-Chorus]
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
You gotta rub me the right way, honey
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
Come, come, come on and let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
You gotta rub me the right way, honey
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
Come, come, come on and let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
You gotta rub me the right way, honey
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
Come, come, come on and let me out

[Verse 1]
I feel like I've been locked up tight
For a century of lonely nights
Waiting for someone to release me
You're lickin' your lips and blowing kisses my way
But that don't mean I'm gonna give it away
Baby, baby, baby (Baby, baby, baby)

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do

[Bridge 1]
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
Come, come, come on and let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
I'm a genie in a bottle, baby
Come, come, come on and let me out

[Verse 2]
The music's banging and the lights down low
Just one more dance and then we're good to go
Waiting for someone who needs me
Hormones racing at the speed of light
But that don't mean it's gotta be tonight
Baby, baby, baby (Baby, baby, baby)

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(My body's saying "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")
(My body's saying "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do

[Bridge 2]
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
I'm a genie in a bottle, come, come, come on let me out

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(My body's saying "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(My body's saying "Let's go")
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
(But my heart is sayin' "No, no")

[Chorus]
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do
If you wanna be with me, baby, there's a price to pay
I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression

I'm a genie in a bottle, you gotta rub me the right way
If you wanna be with me, I can make your wish come true
You gotta make a big impression, I gotta like what you do
